stories.headline: 'I do my best to settle my conscience': SA Premier becomes emotional during press conference
stories.first_sentence: Peter Malinauskas became emotional when journalists pressed him on a range of topics including Adelaide Writers' Week (AWW) and allegations of homophobia against Adelaide United.

stories.headline: I spent months investigating whether gut health affects ageing - and if I could hack my own gut to age better
stories.first_sentence: Guts have become a source of immense fascination.
